channel.title: user account **tunnel**
channel.description: To achive user->proxy->tor->internet method, I'm a Non-Qubes-Whonix user, that I have to run the proxy software run under the linux user account "**tunnel**" on Whonix-Gateway. To login, What's the account password, where to copy the proxy software to, any permission change to the proxy files?

item.title: user account **tunnel**
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is no password.

To run commands as that user, open bash under user tunnel.

sudo -u tunnel bash

Or set a password if you want to login for real.

Read full topic

item.title: user account **tunnel**
